MonsterTrait.Name: Blood Frenzy
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

MonsterTrait.Name: Limited Amphibiousness
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shark Telepathy
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The sahuagin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): guidance, thaumaturgy • 1st level (4 slots): bless, detect magic, guiding bolt • 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (trident) • 3rd level (3 slots): mass healing word, tongues

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
